titleStmt.title: No martial law, but advice for the grand inquests of London, and Middlesex, and may serve generally for the whole kingdome written by a London apprentice, on the behalfe of his fellow apprentices, 1648.
titleStmt.author: Whittington, John.

notesStmt.note: Signed on p. 6: Per me John Whittington, neere Dowgate.
Reproduction of original in: William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
